str2: All, the whole, every kind of. Including all the forms of declension; apparently a primary word; all, any, every, the whole.

str2: But, except, however. Neuter plural of allos; properly, other things, i.e. contrariwise.
No, not. Also ouk, and ouch a primary word; the absolute negative adverb; no or not.

str2: From sun and phero; to bear together, i.e. to collect, or to conduce; especially advantage.

str2: From the same as oikodome; to be a house-builder, i.e. Construct or confirm.
